label_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony 2001 Line Cut Clean Reel 500
summary_teim: Queen and Steely Dan are inducted in the 2001 ceremony broadcast on VH1. Includes performances by Queen.
summary_ssm: Queen and Steely Dan are inducted in the 2001 ceremony broadcast on VH1. Includes performances by Queen.
contents_teim: We will rock you (Queen) -- Jann Wenner introduces Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins -- Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins induct Queen -- Queen accept their award -- Tie your mother down (Queen with Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins) -- Moby inducts Steely Dan -- Steely Dan accept their award.
contents_ssm: We will rock you (Queen) -- Jann Wenner introduces Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins -- Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins induct Queen -- Queen accept their award -- Tie your mother down (Queen with Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins) -- Moby inducts Steely Dan -- Steely Dan accept their award.

abstract_ssm: At 2001 Induction Ceremony, introduction -- We Will Rock You (Queen) -- Jann Wenner gives opening remarks -- Video montage of Queen -- Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins induct Brian May and Roger Meddows Taylor of Queen -- Brian May and Roger Meddows Taylor accept their awards -- Freddie Mercury's mother, Jer, accepts the award on his behalf -- Tie Your Mother Down (Queen with Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins) -- Moby inducts Steely Dan -- Video montage of Steely Dan -- Walter Becker and Donald Fagen of Steely Dan accept their awards.
